sentences.en: Como AIG has issued a subpoena for more information about these bonuses.
sentences.cn: 科莫已向AIG发出传票,索取更多有关这些奖金的信息.

sentences.en: Cuomo had sought the names of the employees who received bonuses from Liddy through a subpoena.
sentences.cn: Cuomo已经找到了那些从Liddy那里通过传票获得奖金的雇员的名字.

sentences.en: Galvin's subpoena Journal , asks for a host internal Goldman documents related to the huddles.
sentences.cn: 传票要求高盛提供一系列与交易业务秘密会议有关的文件.

sentences.en: He accepted service of the subpoena.
He has been served with a subpoena to answer the charges in court.
sentences.cn: 他接到传票要出庭应诉。

sentences.en: He was brought up to court with a subpoena.
sentences.cn: 他接到传讯,来到法庭上.

sentences.en: I'm guessing the other social workers are off limits, too, without a subpoena?
sentences.cn: 没传票其他社工的资料也拿不到?

sentences.en: James was subpoenaed as a witness.
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯被传唤出庭作证。

sentences.en: Man, talk about an underhanded way to deliver a subpoena!
sentences.cn: 嗨, 先生,用这种秘密方式给你送达传票.

sentences.en: People court can stick an annunciate subpoena the accused.
sentences.cn: 人民法院会贴出告示传唤被告.

sentences.en: President Bush has ordered his former White House counsel Harriet Miers to defy a congressional subpoena.
sentences.cn: 布什总统已要求他的前白宫顾问哈里特.米尔思拒绝接受国会的传票.

sentences.en: Select committees have the power to subpoena witnesses.
sentences.cn: 特别委员会有权传唤证人出庭作证。

sentences.en: State Attorney General's Office issues the subpoena.
sentences.cn: 纽约州总检察长办公室发起传唤.

sentences.en: Subpoena shall be issued for coercive summons.
The investigation will rely on existing powers to subpoena documents.
sentences.cn: 该调查将凭借现有权力要求将各种相关文件呈堂。

sentences.en: They got a subpoena to examine our books.
sentences.cn: 他们拿到了传票,要来检查我们的书.

trans.tran_en: a written order to come to a court of law and be a  witness
to order someone to come to a court of law and be a  witness
